affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, "行为, 状态"

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可用的；行得通的；可实行的
熟练的；有经验的；老练的（等于practised）
实践；练习；惯做（practise的过去分词）
实用性，实际性；实际，实例
练习，实践；实施，实行；从事

word_mean_info__list.difference: 普通用词，泛指为从事某种职业而进行的身体或智力方面的训练。
指把所学的理论或知识用于实践以获得技艺与技巧。
主要指为强壮体魄而进行的锻炼，也可指进行练习以保持已经获得的技巧。
侧重进行有系统的，严格和重复的练习。
既可指训练又可指为达到某种熟练程度而进行的约束。
侧重于自然养成的，不易去掉的个人习惯。
常指习惯性的做法或行为。
广义指世代相传的伦理、行为规范和生活方式，特指因长久奉行而几乎具有法律效力的习惯、习俗，侧重历史意义。
多指约定俗成的行为方式规则或公认的标准，或指艺术上公认的技巧。
指持续时间长，为很多人公认采纳的惯例、习俗。
指在某一时期或某一团体中盛行的社会礼仪或社会风俗模式。
指一个国家、一个民族、一个地区或一个社会的习惯、行为方式或风俗习惯。也可指个人的习惯。

word_group.brief_definition: 付诸实践；投入实践；付诸
社会实践；社会实践活动
医疗实践；医学实践；医务实践
专业人士私人从事的业务；私人医师开业
最佳做法；最佳惯例；最佳实践
限制性行业例规；限制性做法；限制竞争协议
卑鄙的交易；很难算是诚实的交易

bilingual.source: This method does not work in practice.
bilingual.target: 这种方法在实践中行不通。

bilingual.source: The course consists of theory and practice.
bilingual.target: 课程由理论和实践组成。

bilingual.source: They practice their religion with great devotion.
bilingual.target: 他们虔诚地实践他们的宗教。

bilingual.source: This teaching method works well in practice.
bilingual.target: 这种教学方法在实践中效果很好。

bilingual.source: It's important to relate theory to practice.
bilingual.target: 将理论与实践使有联系是很重要的。

bilingual.source: In practice, teamwork is the key to success.
bilingual.target: 在实践中，团队合作是成功的关键。

bilingual.source: You need more practice to master this skill.
bilingual.target: 你需要更多的实践来掌握这项技能。

bilingual.source: You can better acquire knowledge through practice.
bilingual.target: 通过实践可以更好地获得知识。

bilingual.source: In practice, these rules do not always apply.
bilingual.target: 在实践中，这些规则并不总是适用。

bilingual.source: They conduct scientific practice in the laboratory.
bilingual.target: 他们在实验室里进行科学实践。

yingyinNormal.en: Maybe she can practice on you some time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 或许有机会她可以跟你练习练习

yingyinNormal.en: Miss! I'm sorry, this is a closed practice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小姐！对不起，练习时间不对外开放。

yingyinNormal.en: Please ask how many practice runs they had. Seventeen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请问下那些机长练习了多少次？17次。

yingyinNormal.en: Your Honor, see, 'cause we have basketball practice, and Troy...
yingyinNormal.zh: 您看，我们有篮球训练，而特洛伊...

yingyinNormal.en: Good afternoon, and welcome to today's physics bowl practice round.
yingyinNormal.zh: 下午好，欢迎你们来到今天的物理碗大赛练习赛。

yingyinNormal.en: You also need a practice running. What if I practice eating today then practice running tomorrow? No, Daddy. You need to practice running now. Oh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但是你应该去练习一下跑步才对。我今天练习吃意大利面，然后明天再练习跑步。不行，爸爸。你现在就应该开始练习跑步。噢。

yingyinNormal.en: Practice, preparation, endless repetition.
yingyinNormal.zh: 练习，准备无尽的重复。

yingyinNormal.en: You just need a bit more practice George. Watch me. Wow.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你需要多一点练习，乔治。看我。

yingyinNormal.en: Look, you don't have to practice a hobby. A hobby is a hobby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 知道吗，你不用训练什么爱好，爱好只是个爱好。

yingyinNormal.en: You haven't missed practice in three years. That girl shows up.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你三年没错过训练。直到她出现...

yingyinNormal.en: When did you last practice law? Well, officially. 13 years ago.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你最后执业是什么时候？正式离职是十三年前。

yingyinNormal.en: But any time the big top was empty, I would practice on the wire.
yingyinNormal.zh: 但只要大帐棚有空档，我就练习走钢索。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm trying a new recipe. I just need a bit more practice. Don't fuss.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我在试一个新食谱。多练一下就好啦。别忙活了。

yingyinNormal.en: All the children have parts in the play. They have to practice at home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所有的孩子都会参加。他们得在家里练习。

yingyinNormal.en: That's cause I'm a woman. I've had years of practice riding the dragon.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因为我是女的，专业驾驭这猛兽几十年了。

yingyinNormal.en: Why all the English? Ah, because I must practice. I'm going to New York.
yingyinNormal.zh: 干嘛都说英语？因为我得练习，我要去纽约。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay, can you please order a cocktail? I need to practice mixing drinks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，你能点鸡尾酒吗？我需要练习调酒。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me practice. You can get rid of me sooner. I already gave you an order!
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我训练，你就能快点甩掉我。我已经给你下过命令了。

yingyinNormal.en: Six years ago, I came across a kid in a practice room working on his scales.
yingyinNormal.zh: 六年前，我在练琴室碰到了一个正在调音阶的孩子。

yingyinNormal.en: Sheldon, I know this isn't easy, but you'll have a whole lifetime to practice.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢尔顿，我知道这很不容易，但你会有一辈子来慢慢练习。

惯例; 常规; 习俗

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 付诸实践；投入实践；付诸

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 玩忽职守；失职；渎职；徇私舞弊
adj. 不能使用的；不可行的；不明智的；不切实际的；不能做的；行不通的；不善实践的；不爱实践的
adj. 实践的；实际的；实质上的；事实上的；可实施的；切合实际的；实用的；可行的；适于某种目的的；有见识的

word_family.mean: n. 实践；实施；实行；应用；反复练习；惯例；习俗；练习时间；诉讼程序；惯常做法

sense_info_list.en: the actual application or use of an idea, belief, or method as opposed to theories about such application or use
sense_info_list.zh: 实践; 做法; 行为

examination_example.sentence: A recent study attempts to separate them by looking at bribery prosecutions under America's Foreign Corrupt <highlight>Practices</highlight> Act.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的一项研究试图通过研究美国《海外反腐败行为法案》下的贿赂指控来区分它们。

examination_example.sentence: But in the everyday <highlight>practice</highlight> of science, discovery frequently follows an ambiguous and complicated route.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在日常的科学实践中，发现往往遵循一个模糊和复杂的路线。

examination_example.sentence: But the real gains come in benefits and work <highlight>practices</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但真正的收获来自福利和工作实践。

sense_info_list.en: repeated exercise in or performance of an activity or skill so as to acquire or maintain proficiency in it

examination_example.sentence: Even if you can't yet do a favorite activity, you can <highlight>practice</highlight> the moves.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使你还不能做你最喜欢的运动，你也可以练习这些动作。

examination_example.sentence: The rats released the social robot because they tried to <highlight>practice</highlight> a means of escape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老鼠们释放了这个社交机器人，因为它们试图练习逃跑的方法。

examination_example.sentence: Polished work that he gave to the world was the result of years of <highlight>practicing</highlight>, re-writing and reading.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经过多年的练习、重写和阅读，他给世界带来了精美的作品。

sense_info_list.en: the customary, habitual, or expected procedure of something
sense_info_list.zh: 惯例; 常规; 习俗
(医生/律师的)工作; 业务活动

word_usage.usage: practice指“实践；（医生或律师的）业务活动”时，是不可数名词，指“诊所；律师事务所；惯例；常规”时，是可数名词。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 做法; 惯例; 习俗

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 玩忽职守；失职；渎职；徇私舞弊
adj. 能实行的；可行的；适用的；有用的
adj. 不能使用的；不可行的；不明智的；不切实际的；不能做的；行不通的；不善实践的；不爱实践的
adv. 事实上；实际上；几乎；讲究实际地；实践上；从实用角度
n. 实际性；实用性；实践性；实际事物；实例；实用之物
adj. 实践的；实际的；实质上的；事实上的；可实施的；切合实际的；实用的；可行的；适于某种目的的；有见识的

word_family.mean: n. 实践；实施；实行；应用；反复练习；惯例；习俗；练习时间；诉讼程序；惯常做法

sense_info_list.en: the customary, habitual, or expected procedure of something
sense_info_list.zh: 做法; 惯例; 习俗

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>practice</highlight> of destroying unsold stock is commonplace for luxury labels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 销毁未售出的库存的做法对于奢侈品牌来说是司空见惯的。

examination_example.sentence: The Grand Tour was a <highlight>practice</highlight> which introduced Englishmen to the art and culture of France and Italy for the next 300 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “伟大旅程”(Grand Tour)这个习惯在接下来的300年里，它向英国人、德国人、斯堪的纳维亚人和美国人介绍了法国和意大利的艺术和文化。

examination_example.sentence: Although calls to share data often concentrate on the moral advantages of sharing, the <highlight>practice</highlight> is not purely altruistic (利他的).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管呼吁共享数据通常集中在共享的道德优势上，但是这种做法并非纯粹是利他的。

sense_info_list.en: repeated exercise in or performance of an activity or skill so as to acquire or maintain proficiency in it

examination_example.sentence: Glenn Schellenberg admits that <highlight>practice</highlight> can change certain areas of the brain.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Glenn Schellenberg 承认训练可以改变大脑的某些区域。

examination_example.sentence: Those who <highlight>practiced</highlight> voluntarily showed improvements in hearing ability.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那些自愿练习的人听力有所改善。

examination_example.sentence: Probing the rock pools of a local beach or <highlight>practising</highlight> French on a language exchange can open their eyes to life's possibilities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在当地海滩的岩石池里探索，或者通过语言交流练习法语，都可以让他们了解到升到生活中的许多可能。

sense_info_list.en: the actual application or use of an idea, belief, or method as opposed to theories about such application or use

examination_example.sentence: By replacing expensive grain feed with regenerative management <highlight>practices</highlight>, grass-fed farmers are insulated from jumps in the price of feed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通过再生管理实践代替昂贵的谷物饲料。草饲农户免受饲料价格上涨的影响。

examination_example.sentence: These <highlight>practices</highlight> include grazing animals on grasses grown from the pasture land's natural seed bank, and fertilized by the comedown fertilizer.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些实践包括在富有天然种子的牧场上放牧，和用动物自己的肥料施肥。

examination_example.sentence: Tim Joseph's grass-fed program is only one example of how American farming <highlight>practice</highlight> is changing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Tim Joseph 的草饲项目只是美国农业实践正在发生变化的一个例子。

sample.mean: n. 正义；公正；公平；法官；司法；审判；公平性；合理性

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, "行为, 状态"

word_usage.usage: practice作名词表“练习，训练”时，为可变名词；表“实践”时，为不可数名词。
practice作名词表“惯例，常规”时，为可数名词；作“(医生、律师的)业务”解时，为不可数名词。
practice作名词，前面无定冠词the时，后跟介词in，而有定冠词the时，后跟介词of。
practice作动词时，后面跟动名词，而不跟不定式。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 做法; 惯例; 习俗
工作; 业务; 事务所; 从事

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 不能使用的；不可行的；不明智的；不切实际的；不能做的；行不通的；不善实践的；不爱实践的
adv. 事实上；实际上；几乎；讲究实际地；实践上；从实用角度
adj. 实践的；实际的；实质上的；事实上的；可实施的；切合实际的；实用的；可行的；适于某种目的的；有见识的

word_family.mean: n. 实践；实施；实行；应用；反复练习；惯例；习俗；练习时间；诉讼程序；惯常做法

sense_info_list.en: repeated exercise in or performance of an activity or skill so as to acquire or maintain proficiency in it

examination_example.sentence: Cooking skills can be improved with <highlight>practice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 烹饪技巧可以通过练习来提高。

examination_example.sentence: Building a neon sign is an art <highlight>practiced</highlight> by professionals trained on the job to mold glass tubes into decorative shapes and letters.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 制作霓虹灯牌是一门艺术，要把玻璃管塑造成装饰性的形状和字母，由受过培训的专业人士完成。

examination_example.sentence: He needed the <highlight>practice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他需要练习。

sense_info_list.en: the actual application or use of an idea; belief; or method as opposed to theories about such application or use

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>practice</highlight> also allowed many pigs to escape from farms and live in the wild, which became a problem.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种做法也让许多猪逃离农场，生活在野外，这成为一个问题。

examination_example.sentence: They made it impossible for him to <highlight>practice</highlight> his art.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们使他无法练习他的艺术。

examination_example.sentence: It's not the knowledge that is valuable, It's the <highlight>practice</highlight> of learning new things and understanding how things work.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有价值的并不是知识本身，而是学习新事物和理解事物如何运作的实践。

sense_info_list.en: the customary; habitual; or expected procedure of something
sense_info_list.zh: 做法; 惯例; 习俗

examination_example.sentence: The term kleptoplasty is used to describe the <highlight>practice</highlight> of create nutrients from sunlight.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 术语“盗食质体”一词是用来描述从阳光中获取营养物质的做法。

examination_example.sentence: We are rediscovering Dewey and Montessori and a lot of the <highlight>practices</highlight> that they pioneered that have been forgotten or at least put aside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们正重新认识到 Dewey 和 Montessori 以及许多由他们开创的、被人遗忘或者说至少被搁置的做法。

examination_example.sentence: Previous drilling of wells could only reach depths of 1, 000 feet, but due to new pumping <highlight>practices</highlight>, water deeper than this can now be extracted (抽取) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以前的钻井只能达到1000英尺的深度。但由于新的抽水方法，现在可以抽取更深的水。

examination_example.sentence: Archiving <highlight>practices</highlight> have changed greatly since the 1970s, and we keep our high value documents in a safe that I don't even have access to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自20世纪70年代以来，存档方式已经发生了很大的变化，而且我们把高价值文件保存在一个我都无法进入的保险箱里。

examination_example.sentence: This method is simple in theory but can be endlessly complex in <highlight>practice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这种方法在理论上很简单，但在实践中可能会非常复杂。

sense_info_list.en: a job or business that involves a lot of skill or training
sense_info_list.zh: 工作; 业务; 事务所; 从事

sample.mean: n. 正义；公正；公平；法官；司法；审判；公平性；合理性
n. 玩忽职守；失职；渎职；徇私舞弊
n. 注意；观察；预先通知；警告；通知；布告；简介；小型广告；简短通告
n. 生手；新手；初学者；见习修士；新皈依的教徒；见习马；与“见习马”情况相似的其他动物
n. 服务；公共服务体系；系统的运行；宗教仪式；成套餐具；发球；正式送达；售后服务；帮助；协助；军队

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, "行为, 状态"

word_usage.usage: practice作动词时，后面跟动名词，而不跟不定式。
practice作名词，前面无定冠词the时，后跟介词in，而有定冠词the时，后跟介词of。
practice作名词表“惯例，常规”时，为可数名词；作“(医生、律师的)业务”解时，为不可数名词。
practice作名词表“练习，训练”时，为可变名词；表“实践”时，为不可数名词。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 付诸实践；投入实践；付诸

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adv. 事实上；实际上；几乎；讲究实际地；实践上；从实用角度
adj. 实践的；实际的；实质上的；事实上的；可实施的；切合实际的；实用的；可行的；适于某种目的的；有见识的

word_family.mean: n. 实践；实施；实行；应用；反复练习；惯例；习俗；练习时间；诉讼程序；惯常做法

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Practice</highlight> reading the words aloud.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 练习大声朗读这些单词。

examination_example.sentence: In poor weather, I read about sports or <highlight>practiced</highlight> my trombone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在糟糕的天气里，我读体育书籍或练习我的长号。

examination_example.sentence: It was a good chance to <highlight>practice</highlight> my Spanish.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个练习我的西班牙语的好机会。

examination_example.sentence: I pays to put theory into <highlight>practice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我为把理论付诸实践而付出代价。

examination_example.sentence: The study of traditions should be combined with <highlight>practice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对传统的研究应该与实践相结合。

examination_example.sentence: Experts say it's an invaluable social <highlight>practice</highlight> that results in big benefits.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 专家表示，这是一项宝贵的社会实践，能带来巨大的利益。

examination_example.sentence: Being a page turner requires plenty of <highlight>practice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 成为一个爱翻书的人需要大量的练习。

examination_example.sentence: And like everything else in life, that takes <highlight>practice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就像生活中的其他事情一样，这需要练习。

examination_example.sentence: I carried my football everywhere for <highlight>practice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了练习，我到处带着我的足球。

examination_example.sentence: Build respect for and awareness of the environment and cultural <highlight>practices</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 建立对环境和文化实践的尊重和意识。

word_usage.usage: 用作动词时，后跟动名词形式作宾语，不用不定式：practicing speaking English练习说英语

exam_freq_info.chinese: 工作; 业务; 事务所; 从事
做法; 惯例; 习俗

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 内行的；熟练的；娴熟的
adj. 熟练的；有经验的；习得的；精通的；老练的
adj. 实践的；实际的；实质上的；事实上的；可实施的；切合实际的；实用的；可行的；适于某种目的的；有见识的

word_family.mean: n. 实践；实施；实行；应用；反复练习；惯例；习俗；练习时间；诉讼程序；惯常做法

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 医疗实践；医学实践；医务实践
社会实践；社会实践活动

sense_info_list.en: repeated exercise in or performance of an activity or skill so as to acquire or maintain proficiency in it

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Practicing</highlight> for a speech is essential.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为演讲而练习是必不可少的。

examination_example.sentence: Miss Huang always advises us to <highlight>practice</highlight> speaking English after class.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 黄老师总是建议我们课后练习说英语。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Practice</highlight> makes perfect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 熟能生巧。

sense_info_list.en: the actual application or use of an idea, belief, or method as opposed to theories about such application or use

examination_example.sentence: However, it was not until the rule of Emperor Wu of Han Dynasty that his ideas were finally put into <highlight>practice</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但直到汉武帝统治时期，他的想法才最终付诸实践。

examination_example.sentence: If schools put it into <highlight>practice</highlight>, students will be more independent and helpful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果学校将此付诸实践，学生们会更加独立和乐于助人。

examination_example.sentence: Compared to traveling, such social <highlight>practice</highlight> connects us and makes us learn how tough our parents are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与旅行相比，这样的社会实践将我们联系在一起，让我们了解到我们的父母有多坚强。

sense_info_list.en: a job or business that involves a lot of skill or training
sense_info_list.zh: 工作; 业务; 事务所; 从事

examination_example.sentence: began to <highlight>practice</highlight> medicine
examination_example.sentence_trans: 开始从事医药行业

examination_example.sentence: Li Shizhen used to help his father in his medical <highlight>practice</highlight> when he was young.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 李时珍年轻时曾帮助父亲行医。

sense_info_list.en: the customary, habitual, or expected procedure of something
sense_info_list.zh: 做法; 惯例; 习俗

examination_example.sentence: It's already common <highlight>practice</highlight> worldwide to limit students' use of mobile phones in primary and secondary schools.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 限制中小学生使用手机已经是世界范围内的普遍做法。

examination_example.sentence: The cultural <highlight>practice</highlight> of ear piercings, for example, has become a part of modern-day culture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，耳洞这种文化习俗已经成为现代文化的一部分。

examination_example.sentence: This is a common <highlight>practice</highlight> since longer ear lobes are seen as a sigh of beauty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一种常见做法，因为较长的耳垂被视为美丽的象征。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>practice</highlight> Islam (伊斯兰教), and many of them are direct descendants (后代) of Silk Road travelers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们信奉伊斯兰教，其中很多人是丝绸之路旅行者的直系后代。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, "行为, 状态"

word_usage.usage: practice作名词表“练习，训练”时，为可变名词；表“实践”时，为不可数名词。
practice作名词表“惯例，常规”时，为可数名词；作“(医生、律师的)业务”解时，为不可数名词。
practice作名词，前面无定冠词the时，后跟介词in，而有定冠词the时，后跟介词of。
practice作动词时，后面跟动名词，而不跟不定式。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指把所学的理论或知识用于实践，以获得技艺与技巧。
主要指为强健体魄而进行的锻炼，也可指为保持已经获得的技巧而进行的练习。
普通用词，泛指身体或智力方面的训练。
常指习惯性的做法或行为。
侧重于自然养成的，不易去掉的个人习惯。
